H0.text: What is the traditional Italian name for the text of an opera or musical. Libretto Italiano

H1.text: What is the traditional Italian name for the text of an opera or musical. Dramma

H2.text: What is the traditional Italian name for the text of an opera or musical. Testo

H3.text: What is the traditional Italian name for the text of an opera or musical. Lobreto

A4.text: A libretto (from the Italian word libretto, lit. 'booklet') is the text used in, or intended for, an extended musical work such as an opera, operetta, masque, oratorio, cantata or musical.

A5.text: The Italian word libretto (pronounced [liˈbretto], plural libretti [liˈbretti]) is the diminutive of the word libro ('book').
